#summary How to add var in parser context.

= Var in parser context =

Add variable named "this" in .cs:
{{{
ParserFacade pf = new ParserFacade();
pf.Parse(Block.Data);
pf.AddVar("this", this);
string actual = pf.Run();
}}}

In parser:
{{{
@main[]
  name of class $this
  call method ^this.method[]
}}}
